spell_tooltip.description:
Shadow Bolt damage increases the duration of your Unstable Affliction, Corruption, Agony, and Siphon Life on the target by 2.0 sec.

Drain Life, Drain Soul, and Oblivion damage increases the duration of your Unstable Affliction, Corruption, Agony, and Siphon Life on the target by 1.0 sec.
Surrounds the caster with a shield that lasts 3 sec, reflecting all harmful spells cast on you.

Fracture the soul of up to 3 target players within 20 yds into the shadows, reducing their damage done by 25% and healing received by 25% for 8 sec. Souls are fractured up to 20 yds from the player's location.

Players can retrieve their souls to remove this effect.
Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Incubus, Succubus, Felhunter, or Felguard Summon spell is free and has its casting time reduced by 90%.
All single-target damage done by you and your minions grants you and your pet shadowy shields that absorb 3% of the damage dealt, up to 10% of maximum health.

Increases your movement speed by 50%, but also damages you for 4% of your maximum health every 1 sec. Movement impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed. Lasts until canceled.

Your Soul Leech absorption now passively recharges at a rate of 0.2% of maximum health every 1 sec, and may now absorb up to 10% of maximum health.

Increases your armor by 90%.

When Soul Leech absorbs damage, 10% of damage taken is absorbed and spread out over 5 sec.

Reduces damage taken by 3.0%.

Grants access to the following abilities:

Curse of Tongues:
Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by 30% for 1 min.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Curse of Exhaustion:
Reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 12 sec.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Summons a Demonic Circle for 15 min. Cast Demonic Circle: Teleport to teleport to its location and remove all movement slowing effects.

You also learn:

 Demonic Circle: Teleport
Teleports you to your Demonic Circle and removes all movement slowing effects.
Let loose a terrifying howl, causing 5 enemies within 10 yds to flee in fear, disorienting them for 20 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Stamina increased by 10%.

Increases the attack speed of your primary pet by 5%. 

Increases Grimoire of Sacrifice damage by 10%.

Increases the damage done by your primary pet by 5%. 

Increases Grimoire of Sacrifice damage by 10%.
Increases you and your pets' maximum health by 5%.
Your Healthstone heals you for an additional 10% of your maximum health. Any party or raid member using a Healthstone also heals you for that amount.
Creates a demonic gateway between two locations. Activating the gateway transports the user to the other gateway. Each player can use a Demonic Gateway only once per 90 sec.
Sacrifices 5% of your current health to shield you for 800% of the sacrificed health plus an additional 225,635 for 20 sec. Usable while suffering from control impairing effects.
Unending Resolve reduces damage taken by an additional 15%.
Stuns all enemies within 8 yds for 3 sec.
Dark Pact sacrifices only 5% of your current health for the same shield value.
Agony damage increased by 15%.
Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul damage increased by 15%.

Your spells have a 5% increased chance to deal a critical strike.

You gain 10% more of the Critical Strike stat from all sources.
Soul Leech also heals you for 15% and your pet for 100% of the absorption it grants.

20% of all damage you take is taken by your demon pet instead. 

While Grimoire of Sacrifice is active, your Stamina is increased by 5%.

Healthstones you conjure for yourself are now Demonic Healthstones and can be used multiple times in combat. Demonic Healthstones cannot be traded.

 Demonic Healthstone
Instantly restores 35% health. 60 sec cooldown.
Every Soul Shard you spend has a 5% chance to be refunded.

Consumes a Soul Shard, unlocking the hidden power of your spells.

Demonic Circle: Teleport: Increases your movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to snares and roots for 6 sec.

Demonic Gateway: Can be cast instantly.

Drain Life: Gain an absorb shield equal to the amount of healing done for 30 sec. This shield cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.

Health Funnel: Restores 140% more health and reduces the damage taken by your pet by 30% for 10 sec.

Healthstone: Increases the healing of your Healthstone by 30% and increases your maximum health by 20% for 12 sec.

Afflicts one target with 2.3 million Shadow damage over 21 sec. 

If dispelled, deals 5 million damage to the dispeller and silences them for 4 sec.

Generates 1 Soul Shard if the target dies while afflicted.
Agony's damage starts at 4 stacks and may now ramp up to 18 stacks.

Embeds a demon seed in the enemy target that will explode after 9.5 sec, dealing 111,717 Shadow damage to all enemies within 10 yards and applying Corruption to them.

The seed will detonate early if the target is hit by other detonations, or takes 45,127 damage from your spells.

Corruption is now permanent and deals 15% increased damage.

Duration reduced to 24 sec against players.
Malefic Rapture damage increased by 8%. Corruption damage increased by 20%.

Corruption damage has a chance to cause your next Shadow Bolt or Drain Soul to deal 75% increased damage. 

Shadow Bolt is instant cast and Drain Soul channels 50% faster when affected.

Refreshing Agony with 10 or less seconds remaining deals 143,648 Shadow damage to its target and enemies within 10 yards.

Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Reduces the cast time of Shadow Bolt by 15% and increases its damage by 40%.
Increases the damage dealt by your spells and your demon by 3%.
Unleashes a vile explosion at the target location, dealing 515,722 Shadow damage over 10 sec to 8 enemies within 10 yds and applies Agony and Curse of Exhaustion to them.

A ghostly soul haunts the target, dealing 446,254 Shadow damage and increasing your damage dealt to the target by 10% for 18 sec.

If the target dies, Haunt's cooldown is reset.
Shadow Bolt applies Shadow Embrace, increasing your damage dealt to the target by 4% for 16 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.

Summons a Darkglare from the Twisting Nether that extends the duration of your damage over time effects on all enemies by 8 sec.

The Darkglare will serve you for 20 sec, blasting its target for 151,916 Shadow damage, increased by 45% for every damage over time effect you have active on their current target.
Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul have a chance to trigger a Shadow Bolt Volley, dealing 165,219 Shadow damage to 5 enemies within 10 yards of your current target.
Increases the critical strike chance of Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction by 20%.
Increases the damage of your Darkglare by 70%. When Darkglare extends damage over time effects it also sears affected targets for 713,341 Shadow damage.
Malefic Rapture damage is increased by 8% for each enemy it hits, up to 5 enemies.
Your Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction deal damage 15% faster.

Wither away all life force of your current target and up to 4 additional targets nearby, causing your primary target to suffer 1.3 million Shadow damage and secondary targets to suffer 676,151 Shadow damage over 8 sec.

Damage dealt by Soul Rot heals you for 50% of damage done.

While Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction are active, your Shadow Bolt has a 30% chance and your Drain Soul has a 20% chance to make your next Malefic Rapture cost no Soul Shards and cast instantly.
Unstable Affliction deals 20% increased damage.
Malefic Rapture deals 40% increased damage to targets suffering from Unstable Affliction.

Casting Soul Rot grants 3 applications of Malign Omen.

 Malign Omen
Your next Malefic Rapture deals 20% increased damage and extends the duration of your damage over time effects and Haunt by 2 sec.
Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul deal 8% increased damage, up to 24%, per damage over time effect you have active on the target.
Increases Malefic Rapture damage by 5% and reduces its cast time by 10%.
Each target affected by Soul Rot increases your haste and critical strike chance by 4.0% for 8 sec.
Malefic Rapture deals an additional 112,485 Shadowflame damage to each target it affects.

A demonic entity now inhabits your soul, allowing you to detect if a Soul Shard has a Succulent Soul when it's generated. 

A Succulent Soul empowers your next Malefic Rapture, increasing its damage by 20%, and unleashing your demonic soul to deal an additional 179,883 Shadow damage.
Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul damage increased by 20%. Nightfall increases the damage of Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul by an additional 50%.

Unleashing your demonic soul bestows a fiendish entity unto the soul of its targets, dealing 357,620 Shadow damage over 8 sec.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Soul Anathema.
Your demonic soul deals 100% increased damage to targets affected by your Unstable Affliction.
Dark Pact now shields you for an additional 50% of the sacrificed health.

When you kill a target, its tortured soul is flung into a nearby enemy for 3 sec. This effect inflicts 47,363 Shadow damage to enemies within 10 yds every 0.8 sec.

Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Fel Domination cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.

Damage dealt by your demonic soul is increased by 10%.

Consuming Nightfall feeds the demonic entity within you, causing it to appear and deal 244,846 Shadow damage to your target.

Soul Anathema damage increased by 25% and is dealt 20% faster.

Consuming Nightfall activates Shared Fate or Feast of Souls.
Corruption deals damage 25% faster and Haunt grants Nightfall.
Your Soul Rot spell is empowered by the demonic entity within you, causing it to grant 3 Soul Shards that each contain a Succulent Soul.
Chaos Bolt creates a 5 yd wide eruption of Felfire under the target, reducing movement speed by 50% and reducing all healing received by 25% on all enemies within the fissure. Lasts 6 sec.
Surrounds the caster with a shield that lasts 3 sec, reflecting all harmful spells cast on you.
Encircle enemy players with Bonds of Fel. If any affected player leaves the 8 yd radius they explode, dealing 680,318 Fire damage split amongst all nearby enemies.
Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Incubus, Succubus, Felhunter, or Felguard Summon spell is free and has its casting time reduced by 90%.

Increases your movement speed by 50%, but also damages you for 4% of your maximum health every 1 sec. Movement impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed. Lasts until canceled.

Your Soul Leech absorption now passively recharges at a rate of 0.2% of maximum health every 1 sec, and may now absorb up to 10% of maximum health.

Increases your armor by 90%.

When Soul Leech absorbs damage, 10% of damage taken is absorbed and spread out over 5 sec.

Reduces damage taken by 3.0%.

Grants access to the following abilities:

Curse of Tongues:
Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by 30% for 1 min.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Curse of Exhaustion:
Reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 12 sec.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Summons a Demonic Circle for 15 min. Cast Demonic Circle: Teleport to teleport to its location and remove all movement slowing effects.

You also learn:

 Demonic Circle: Teleport
Teleports you to your Demonic Circle and removes all movement slowing effects.
Let loose a terrifying howl, causing 5 enemies within 10 yds to flee in fear, disorienting them for 20 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Stamina increased by 10%.

Increases the attack speed of your primary pet by 5%. 

Increases Grimoire of Sacrifice damage by 10%.

Increases the damage done by your primary pet by 5%. 

Increases Grimoire of Sacrifice damage by 10%.
Increases you and your pets' maximum health by 5%.
Your Healthstone heals you for an additional 10% of your maximum health. Any party or raid member using a Healthstone also heals you for that amount.
Creates a demonic gateway between two locations. Activating the gateway transports the user to the other gateway. Each player can use a Demonic Gateway only once per 90 sec.
Sacrifices 5% of your current health to shield you for 800% of the sacrificed health plus an additional 225,635 for 20 sec. Usable while suffering from control impairing effects.
Unending Resolve reduces damage taken by an additional 15%.
Stuns all enemies within 8 yds for 3 sec.
Dark Pact sacrifices only 5% of your current health for the same shield value.
Agony damage increased by 15%.
Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul damage increased by 15%.

Your spells have a 5% increased chance to deal a critical strike.

You gain 10% more of the Critical Strike stat from all sources.
Soul Leech also heals you for 15% and your pet for 100% of the absorption it grants.

20% of all damage you take is taken by your demon pet instead. 

While Grimoire of Sacrifice is active, your Stamina is increased by 5%.

Healthstones you conjure for yourself are now Demonic Healthstones and can be used multiple times in combat. Demonic Healthstones cannot be traded.

 Demonic Healthstone
Instantly restores 35% health. 60 sec cooldown.
Every Soul Shard you spend has a 5% chance to be refunded.

Consumes a Soul Shard, unlocking the hidden power of your spells.

Demonic Circle: Teleport: Increases your movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to snares and roots for 6 sec.

Demonic Gateway: Can be cast instantly.

Drain Life: Gain an absorb shield equal to the amount of healing done for 30 sec. This shield cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.

Health Funnel: Restores 140% more health and reduces the damage taken by your pet by 30% for 10 sec.

Healthstone: Increases the healing of your Healthstone by 30% and increases your maximum health by 20% for 12 sec.

Triggers an explosion on the target, dealing 195,721 Fire damage.

Generates 5 Soul Shard Fragments.
Conflagrate reduces the cast time of your next Incinerate, Chaos Bolt, or Soul Fire by 30%. Maximum 2 charges.

Calls down a rain of hellfire upon your target, dealing 310,432 Fire damage over 6.3 sec to enemies in the area.

This spell is cast at your target.
Conflagrate increases your Immolate, Incinerate, and Conflagrate damage to the target by 25% for 8 sec.

Increases your critical strike chance by 3%.

Physical attacks against you have a 25% chance to make your next Incinerate instant cast. This effect can only occur once every 6 sec.
Marks a target with Havoc for 15 sec, causing your single target spells to also strike the Havoc victim for 60% of the damage dealt.
Calls forth a cataclysm at the target location, dealing 341,086 Shadowflame damage to all enemies within 8 yards and afflicting them with Immolate.
Backdraft increases the damage of your next Chaos Bolt by 5% and increases the critical strike chance of your next Incinerate or Soul Fire by 35%.
Increases the damage of Immolate by 25% and its duration by 3 sec.

Blasts a target for 231,961 Shadowflame damage, gaining 50% critical strike chance on targets that have 20% or less health.

Restores 1 Soul Shard and refunds a charge if the target dies within 5 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Conflagrate by 2 sec.
Increases the damage dealt by your spells and your demon by 3%.
Launches 15 bolts of felfire over 2.4 sec at random targets afflicted by your Immolate within 40 yds. Each bolt deals 36,260 Fire damage to the target and 18,260 Fire damage to nearby enemies.
Conflagrate and Shadowburn have a 50% chance to guarantee your next cast of the ability to critically strike, and increase its damage by your critical strike chance.
Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 2% and reduces the cast time of your Incinerate spell by 20%.

Summons an Infernal from the Twisting Nether, impacting for 54,884 Fire damage and stunning all enemies in the area for 2 sec.

The Infernal will serve you for 30 sec, dealing 55,150 damage to all nearby enemies every 1.6 sec and generating 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 1 sec.
Incinerate now also hits all enemies near your target for 25% damage.
Channel Demonfire fires an additional 2 bolts. Each bolt increases the remaining duration of Immolate on all targets hit by 0.5 sec.
Chaos Bolt and Shadowburn increases the damage you deal to the target by 5% for 7 sec.
Summon Infernal increases the damage of your next 8 casts of Chaos Bolt by 25% or your next 8 casts of Rain of Fire by 35%.
Your spells have a chance to grant you 15% Haste for 8 sec.
Increases the damage of Channel Demonfire by 30% and it deals damage 35% faster.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Destruction spells by 5%.
Every 20 Soul Shards spent grants Ritual of Ruin, making your next Chaos Bolt or Rain of Fire consume no Soul Shards and have its cast time reduced by 50%.

Burns the enemy's soul, dealing 443,084 Fire damage and applying Immolate.

Generates 1 Soul Shard.
Increases the damage of Chaos Bolt by 10% and reduces its cast time by 0.5 sec.
Ritual of Ruin requires 5 less Soul Shards spent.
When your direct damaging abilities deal a critical strike, they have a chance to reset the cooldown of Soul Fire and reduce the cast time of your next Soul Fire by 80%.
Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, and Shadowburn always gain at least 70% of the maximum benefit from your Mastery: Chaotic Energies.

Consuming Ritual of Ruin summons an Overfiend for 8 sec.

 Summon Overfiend
Generates 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 1 sec and casts Chaos Bolt at 80% effectiveness at its summoner's target.
Enemies damaged by your Overlord have their souls cloven, increasing damage taken by you and your pets by 5% for 15 sec.

Demonic Art increases the damage of your next Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn by 100% and reduces its cast time by 50%.

Casting Chaos Bolt reduces the duration of Diabolic Ritual by 1 additional sec.

Mother of Chaos empowers your next Incinerate to become Infernal Bolt.

 Infernal Bolt
Hurl a bolt enveloped in the infernal flames of the abyss, dealing 1.2 million Fire damage to your enemy target and generating 3 Soul Shards.
Howl of Terror cooldown is reduced by 15 sec and range is increased by 5 yds.
Summon Infernal grants Diabolic Ritual and reduces its duration by 3 sec.
Unending Resolve heals you for 30% of your maximum health over 10 sec.
Fire damage increased by 2% and damage dealt by your demons is increased by 2%.
Summon Infernal becomes empowered, dealing 40% increased damage. When your Summon Infernal ends, it fragments into two smaller Infernals at 50% effectiveness that lasts 10 sec.
Enemies marked by your Havoc take 7% increased damage from your single target spells.

Summoning a Pit Lord causes your next Chaos Bolt to become Ruination.

 Ruination
Call down a demon-infested meteor from the depths of the Twisting Nether, dealing 1 million Chaos damage on impact to all enemies within 8 yds of the target and summoning 3 Wild Imps.

Damage is reduced beyond 8 targets.
